job.title: Software Engineer, 2021-2022 New Grad
job.description: Wed love to hear from you if you likebrulli Startup energy working with a brilliant and passionate teamlili 900 billion market opportunitylili Exponential growth 10X revenue in 2020lili Rockstar teammates You will be working with a strong leadership team from Facebook WikiHow Amazon Lending Club GEICO SoFi etcbrbrliulstrong About Jerry brbrstrongJerry is building the first Super App to save car owners time and money on all their car expenses Drivers deserve better Thats why were committed to making shopping for insurance financing maintenance repairs parking and more just a few clicks texts or swipes awaybrbrJerry is taking processes that havent substantively changed in decades and reimagining and redesigning them Using artificial intelligence machine learning and bots Jerry eliminates the need for long forms and phone calls while providing personalized services for all carowners needsbrbrToday Jerry is the 1 rated and most downloaded app in its category and the fastest way to compare and buy car insurance We just passed our 1M customer mark in the car insurance category and we are just getting started Jerry is replicating that frictionless experience in other car expense categoriesbrbrJoin our team of curious and passionate people who love tackling realworld problems and be a part of building a revolutionary product thats disrupting a massive marketbrbrJerry was founded in 2017 by serial entrepreneurs who previously built and scaled YourMechanic and has raised more than 130 million in financingbrbrA few examples of the exciting projects that we are working onbrulli Create a smart prediction engine for customers insurance coverage needslili Build predictive models on customer purchase behavior based on a large data setlili Use telematics tracking to build customer driving risk profilebrbrliulstrong About YOU brstrongulli You love tackling convoluted problems and coming up with clean stable solutions that scalelili You have a genuine passion for designing and implementing elegant software solutionslili You are intimately familiar and up to date with the development ecosystem and make sound decisions when choosing the right tool or library for the joblili You will contribute across the entire product stack as well as collectively oversee the integrity of the codebasebrbrliulstrong A Few More Specifics About YOU brstrongulli 1  years of fulltime software development experiencelili BS degree in Computer Science or related disciplinelili Strong software development fundamentals data structures algorithms etclili Proficient with modern web application development with knowledge of JS ecosystems and open source web frameworks eg NodeJS  React  GraphQL  PostgreSQL  Redshift  Redis  Kuberneteslili Knowledge of good practices preferred design patterns and writing idiomatic Javascript codelili Solid understanding of performance implications and scalability of codelili Keenness for writing good meaningful tests and maintaining thorough test coveragelili Experience with large complex codebases and know how to maintain themliul
